name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! 5
overview: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! 5 is a pachi-slot (gambling machine) game that features a perfect recreation of 3 gambling machines (New Big Pulsar, Ultra Seven & Final Bunny) with different modes and a possible view of the full machine. The game also features a story mode in which the player takes the role of a gambler that goes around pachinko places to play the machines and increase his money to win prizes.
